author: BV Designs

changelog.release_notes: Version 2.62: Now available for Pebble 2 and Pebble Time 2!
Version 2.61: Addition of BPM and unobstructed improvements.
Version 2.50:  Now with the option to choose static instead of automatic background colour.
Version 2.01:  Fixed the battery bar issue of not updating to correctly reflect the battery level.

Version 2.0: NEW features added! 
- Now including a settings configuration page 
- Option to change date formats (UK & US style) 
- Option to vibrate when disconnected
- Date displays the language chosen in user settings 
- NEW battery bar for Pebble Time and Round users! Sitting unobtrusively below the time, the bar indicates the battery level as follows:-
    - GREEN when 80% and over
    - ORANGE when between 30% - 80%
    - RED when under 30%

Simple watchface with a daily step counter at the bottom. The time appears in 12 or 24 hour mode depending on your Pebble settings. The background colour randomly changes each minute. The white stripe in the middle disappears when Bluetooth is disconnected. Vibrates with each connection status. Enjoy, and send a heart if you do!! Please check out my other watchfaces as well.
